title: Learning Survival Distribution with Implicit Survival Function. (arXiv:2305.14655v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Survival analysis aims at modeling the relationship between covariates and event occurrence with some untracked (censored) samples. In implementation, existing methods model the survival distribution with strong assumptions or in a discrete time space for likelihood estimation with censorship, which leads to weak generalization. In this paper, we propose Implicit Survival Function (ISF) based on Implicit Neural Representation for survival distribution estimation without strong assumptions,and employ numerical integration to approximate the cumulative distribution function for prediction and optimization. Experimental results show that ISF outperforms the state-of-the-art methods in three public datasets and has robustness to the hyperparameter controlling estimation precision.
context:
Title: Learning Survival Distribution with Implicit Survival Function. (arXiv:2305.14655v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: Survival analysis aims at modeling the relationship between covariates and event occurrence with some untracked (censored) samples. In implementation, existing methods model the survival distribution with strong assumptions or in a discrete time space for likelihood estimation with censorship, which leads to weak generalization. In this paper, we propose Implicit Survival Function (ISF) based on Implicit Neural Representation for survival distribution estimation without strong assumptions,and employ numerical integration to approximate the cumulative distribution function for prediction and optimization. Experimental results show that ISF outperforms the state-of-the-art methods in three public datasets and has robustness to the hyperparameter controlling estimation precision.
translated_title: 基于隐含生存函数的生存分析建模
translated_abstract: 生存分析旨在模拟协变量和事件发生之间的关系，并且存在一些未跟踪的（被审查的）样本。在实现过程中，现有方法模拟生存分布时，需要强的假设或者在离散时间空间中进行，以进行资料分析的时候考虑审查问题，这导致了广义推广的困难。本文提出了一种基于隐函数表征的隐含生存函数（ISF）用于生存分布的资料分析，不需要结果进行强的假设，并采用数值积分来逼近预测和优化的累计分布函数。实验结果表明，ISF在三个公共数据集中的性能优于现有技术，并对控制估计精度的超参数具有鲁棒性。
tldr: 本文提出一种基于隐含生存函数的生存分析建模方法，通过数值积分来进行资料分析，无需进行强假设，且具有鲁棒性，能够在三个公共数据集中表现出优异的性能。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a survival analysis modeling method based on Implicit Survival Function (ISF), which uses numerical integration for data analysis without strong assumptions, and has robustness in estimation precision. ISF outperforms state-of-the-art methods in three public datasets.
